title: Journey Orchestration Step Data Fetch Fields
description: Journey Orchestration Data Fetch Field for a Step Event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Journey Step Event Data Fetch Field.
fetchTotalTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field describes the total amount of time spent in data fetch in milliseconds during the step processing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchTypeInError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field defines if the fetch in error is on the platform or on a custom data source.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field describes the type of error that happens when the data fetch is processed.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchErrorCode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field describes the Code for fetch error. Present if the error has a code, such as an HTTP one. For instance, if the actionExecError is http, the code 404 represents the HTTP 404 error.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchOriginError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field tells if there are any timeout or origin error, If the error comes on a retry:  the OriginError/OriginErrorCode describes the error encountered on the attempt before the retry.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchOriginErrorCode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field describes the error code encountered on the attempt before the retry, Error type is being defined by fetchOriginError.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field gives the count , How many times the data is fetched, regardless of the type of source (AEP, custom).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchPlatformTotalTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The total amount of time taken to fetch the data from Adobe Experience Platform (AEP) in milliseconds.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchPlatformCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: How many times the data is fetched from Adobe Experience Platform(AEP).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchCustomTotalTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Time to fetch the custom data in milliseconds. Remark: this time is computed from the time the engine sends the enrichment event to the enrichment service and receive the response.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: fetchCustomCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: How many times the custom data is fetched from external systems.
